action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you donâ€™t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information: In accordance with government guidelines to minimize transmission of the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary, and other relevant info on dates where such guidelines exist. In response to the coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property. Please inform Le's Cham Hotel of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation.

policies.content: Note that if canceled, modified, or in case of no-show, the total price of the reservation will be charged. If you donâ€™t show up you will be charged the total price of the reservation.

All children are welcome. Up to two children under 6 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
Up to two children from 6 to 12 year are charged  VND 150000 per night when using existing beds.
Up to two children from 12 to 18 year are charged  VND 250000 per night when using existing beds.
One child under 3 years stays free of charge in a crib.
Up to two older children or adults are charged  VND 250000 per night for extra beds.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 2.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 10.
The maximum number of cribs in a room is 1.
Any type of extra bed or crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in the hotel rooms and is free of charge.
Free public parking is available  on site (reservation is not needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price at any time.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. A City tax is not applicable. A Service charge is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.
A Service charge is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
